title: Json Resume Registry: Job Recommendation API and How to Use It
JSON Resume - mcp server for windsurf and cursor
description:
Enhance your JSON Resume automatically with AI! üöÄ The JSON Resume MCP Server analyzes your codebase, extracts project details, and updates your resume seamlessly. Integrated with GitHub Gists and powered by OpenAI, this tool makes resume updates effortless. Learn how to install, configure, and use it in Windsurf or Cursor.

üîó Get it now: npm install -g @jsonresume/mcp
üëç Like & Subscribe for more AI-powered dev tools!

title: JSON Resume - Using the registry through Github gist
description: AI Generated Summary: Hey team, in this video, I walk you through a new feature on the Resume Registry that allows for easy resume updates via GitHub gists. By simply uploading a gist named "resume.json," your resume is rendered on a unique URL. No need for manual hosting! I demonstrate how changes reflect instantly and discuss the convenience of tracking revisions. Check it out for a hassle-free resume management solution!

title: Using JSON Resume to make a Latex resume with RenderCV
description:
https://github.com/sinaatalay/rendercv?tab=readme-ov-file

AI Summary - Hey there! In this quick demo, I showcase how RenderCV, a library for LaTeX JSON resumes, can create stunning and customizable resumes. I highlight the conversion process from JSON to RenderCV's data format, showcasing the output and features. Join me as I delve into this inspiring project and its potential for enhancing JSON resumes.

title: Kalei Style Guide - Explanation and Demo
description:
http://kaleistyleguide.com

This project aims at making sure your style sheets are fully documented whilst being synchronized with your webpages styles. To do this it actually uses your live stylesheets in so that at anytime you can review how your styleguide looks.

title: Backbone.js Tutorial - Beginners
description:
Update: Make sure you use the versions of the libraries I use in the video, this is probably the source of any of your problems. (jQuery@1.8.2/Underscore@1.4.2/Backbone@0.9.2)

Update: New API url is  http://backbone-beginner.tutorial.com/usersÔªø

Hi guys, we will be building the example below from start to finish.

http://backbonetutorials.com/videos/beginner/

Taking all the content from the website, I've put together a 70 minute video which should get you up to speed with how everything pieces together.

In the video we go through the steps from start to finish on how to construct the app linked below.

We implement the entire code on a single page so you can easily see what is going on and there is also a simple RESTful api provided for us to work with.

The video uses diagrams to try explain the process and the accompanying README and be found in the repository.

https://github.com/thomasdavis/backbonetutorials/blob/gh-pages/videos/beginner/README.md

My Github: http://github.com/thomasdavis
My Homepage: http://thomasdav.is
